column5: Beautiful Texas Rancher on Lake Road near the dam, Miller Springs, dam reservoir, the Expo Center, University of Mary Hardin Baylor, Franks Marina, The Dead Fish Grill, Walmart, Super H-E-B, the cinema and a beautiful downtown Belton. This beautiful Rancher has a huge fenced rock yard with incredible trees. The inside is very cozy with open spaces and nice furnishings. The kitchen is huge and capable of serving a large number of people. This home is perfect for your family and pet friendly.
column8: Lake Road - Beautiful Texas Rancher - No Fees
